Our Partners and Clients
Our Story

While renewing our insurance each year, we noticed our broker goes through the typical cycle: 1-2 weeks to get an initial quote, then another 1-2 weeks for a re-quote for the quotes we weren’t happy with, then finding time to sign the policy documents and then tediously paying via bank transfer and then having final documents mailed to us. It’s been like this each year, for the past 10 years…

Not only did we realize it was inefficient, it was an incredible waste of paper (seriously, who reads their policy documents). Moreover, when we visited the broker, we realized they were sending back and forth excel documents to their product carriers… This is the status quo for over 90% of the insurance industry, globally. We realized something had to change, and thus, PolicyDock was born!

Our Team

Today, We’re a diverse team of old school meets new school with backgrounds in fintech, blockchain, big data, AI & machine learning and venture capital with combined experience of over 70 years of software development in the insurance industry whom have worked on 3 different continents
